participant_1.background:
I spend time with my alpacas, they help me feel better.
my dad was a cop until he was killed.
I'm a single guy living in a small apartment with my dog.
I like to spend rainy days organizing my office supplies.
I wake up and put on my favorite name band shirt before heading out to the skatepark.

participant_2.background:
I go to a shelter to volunteer and get my car fixed.
My car is my most valued possession because it allows me to travel to and from work and to enjoy my favorite pastime, watching sports.
until then i will make 215 an hour.
I'm a farmer who likes to pickle eggs and horseback ride in my spare time.
i ve been married five times.

content.text: Hey how are you doing today?
Great, thanks! I'm a farmer who likes to pickle eggs and horseback ride in my spare time.
That sounds amazing! I'm a single guy living in a small apartment with my dog. I like to spend rainy days organizing my office supplies.
What do you do for work?
I'm an insurance salesman, but I'm looking to get into a new career.
What kind of career are you interested in?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going back to school to get my degree in business.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm sure you'll be successful in whatever you do.
No problem. What's your favorite band?
I like to wake up and put on my favorite band shirt before heading out to the skatepark.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to a skatepark before.
You should check it out sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
